title: [SKIN BUG] Gladiator Draven Auto Attack sound bug
body:
Hi Riot,
The Gladiator Draven skin does not make a sound when auto attacking like normal. This has been a problem for a while, and I have posted a thread similar to this a while ago, yet I have been ignored. This, I believe, should be a simple fix and I was hoping if you can hot fix it. Gladiator Draven is one of my favorite skins, but I cannot play it because the lack of sound throws my farming skills off. I am sorry I cannot provide a video, as my computer is too slow to record screen and audio. Please fix!!!

replies.body:
Hey Draven Always, 

Thanks for the report! We'll see what's going on with Gladiator Draven. :]

EDIT: Just checked his auto attacks, and I can hear the impact sound.
When he releases his Q I mean, it does not make a noise. Is this just for me?
It's a bit harder to notice, but I'm hearing SFX when he releases his Q.
thank you for checking this out! I am not sure if this is just me. I do hear sounds on a crit Q.
No worries. I had to turn off other sounds, and pump up SFX to make sure I was hearing it.
